required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Percutaneous Cryoablation Versus Partial Nephrectomy for T1b Renal Tumor
clinical_study.official_title: A Prospective, Non-randomized, in Parallel Groups Study Evaluating the Efficacy and Safety of Percutaneous Cryoablation and Partial Nephrectomy in Localized T1b Renal Tumor

lead_sponsor.agency: I.M. Sechenov First Moscow State Medical University

clinical_study.source: I.M. Sechenov First Moscow State Medical University

brief_summary.textblock: The aim of our study is to assess the long-term oncological and functional outcomes of cryoablation for T1b renal tumors, as well as such important parameters as the patient's quality of life after treatment, and to compare the results with those after partial nephrectomy.

primary_outcome.description: Local recurrance will be evaluated with CT after 6 months, a year, then annually - up to 5 years after the treatment

secondary_outcome.description: Presence of metastases will be evaluated with CT after 6 months, a year, then annually - up to 5 years after the treatment

secondary_outcome.measure: Quality of life assessment: The European Organisation for Research and Treatment of Cancer Quality of Life Questionnaire (EORTC QLQ C-30)
secondary_outcome.description: Quality of life will be assessed using scales EORTC QLQ C-30, ranging from 1 to 100, where higher score indicating a better Quality of Life
Renal function will be evaluated with eGFR
Rate of intra- and postoperative adverse events will be assessed according to Clavien-Dindo grade system
Number of days spent in hospital
Pain score will be assessed using visual analogue scale

arm_group.description: Patients with T1b renal tumor and ECOQ>20

intervention.description: Renal biopsy will be performed prior to the cryoablation on the basis of the center and according to the current protocols
Cryoablation under CT guidance will be performed on the basis of the center and according to the current protocols
Partial nephrectomy will be performed on the basis of the center and according to the current protocols

facility.name: Institute for Urology and Reproductive Health, Sechenov University.

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: I.M. Sechenov First Moscow State Medical University
